# AF/MF SETTING (Movie Recording)

## AF+MF
Select **ON** to enable manual focus in focus modes **S** and **C**. Manual focus can be suspended by pressing the **AFON** button.

| Options |   |
|---------|---|
| ON      |   |
| OFF     |   |

## MF ASSIST
Choose how focus is displayed in manual focus mode (ðŸ“– 104).

| Option                     | Description                                                                 |
|----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHT       | The camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level. |
| FOCUS METER                | A needle indicates whether focus is in front of or behind the subject.       |
| FOCUS METER + PEAK HIGHLIGHT | Focus is indicated by both a meter and peak highlights.                     |
| FOCUS MAP                  | Indicators for locations in and out of focus are displayed on the screen.    |
| OFF                        | Focus is displayed normally (MF assist cannot be used).                      |

## INTERLOCK MF ASSIST & FOCUS RING
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (ðŸ“– 158).
